sub_title: Partner RiskAtWork and Professor of Actuarial Science (UM)
summary:
Antoon Pelsser is an consultant in the area of pricing and risk-management at RiskAtWork.

He also holds a part-time position as Full Professor of Finance and Actuarial Science at Maastricht University. His research interests focus on pricing models for interest rate derivatives, the pricing of insurance and pension contracts and Asset-Liability Management (ALM).

Specialties: Market-consistent valuation and risk management of insurance and pension contacts.
Pricing and risk-management of derivatives.
ALM and Risk-management for insurance companies.
Replicating Portfolio
